FuncDef: This command configures the cipher suite to be negotiated by the server and client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index number. The index number provides the location of the cipher in the negotiation list, with the lower index numbers being higher in the negotiation list and the higher index numbers being at the bottom of the list. Values-1 to 255.
Specifies the cipher suite code. Values-tls-rsa-with-null-md5.
